sentences.sContent: Using a treeview to represent arbitrary objects organized in an arbitrary fashion at the whim of a programmer is asking for big trouble when it comes to usability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Using a treeview to represent arbitrary objects organized in an arbitrary fashion at the whim of a programmer is asking for big trouble when it comes to usability.
sentences.sCn: 程序员一时兴起以一种武断的方式来采用树形视图表现随意的对象，在可用性方面会遇到很大的问题。

synos.tran: 奇想；一时的兴致；怪念头；幻想

remMethod.val: 不要在意him (他) whim (一时的兴致) → 一时的兴致

trans.tranOther: a sudden feeling that you would like to do or have something, especially when there is no important or good reason
